Verses: 1 karththarai Thudhiyungal, Avar Nallavar; Avar Kirubai Endrumulladhu.
2 avar Kirubai Endrumulladhendru Isravel Solvadhaaga.
3 avar Kirubai Endrumulladhendru, Aaronin Kudumbaththaar Solvaargalaaga.
4 avar Kirubai Endrumulladhendru, Karththarukku Bayappadugiravargal Solvaargalaaga.
5 nerukkaththilirundhu Karththarai Nokki Kooppitten, Karththar Ennai Kettaruli Visaalaththile Vaiththaar.
6 karththar En Patchaththil Irukkiraar, Naan Bayappaden; Manushan Enakku Ennaseyvaan?
7 enakku Anugoolam Pannugiravargal Naduvil Karththar En Patchaththil Irukkiraar; En Saththurukkalil Sarikkattudhalai Kaanben.
8 manushanai Nambuvadhaippaarkkilum, Karththar Peril Patrudhalaayiruppadhe Nalam.
9 pirabukkalai Nambuvadhaippaarkkilum, Karththar Peril Patrudhalaayiruppadhe Nalam.
10 ellaa Jaadhiyaarum Ennai Valaindhukollugiraargal; Karththarudaiya Naamaththinaal Avargalai Sangarippen.
11 ennai Sutrilum Valaindhukollugiraargal; Karththarudaiya Naamaththinaal Avargalai Sangarippen.
12 theneekkalaippola Ennai Valaindhukollugiraargal; Mullil Patrina Neruppaippola Anaindhu Povaargal; Karththarudaiyanaamaththinaal Avargalai Sangarippen.
13 naan Vizhumpadi Nee Ennai Thallinaai; Karththaro Enakku Udhaviseydhaar.
14  Karththar En Belanum, En Keedhamumaanavar; Avar Enakku Ratchippumaanaar.
15 needhimaangaludaiya Koodaarangalil Ratchippin Gembeerasaththam Undu; Karththarin Valadhukaram Baraakkiramanseyyum.
16 karththarin Valadhukaram Uyarndhirukkiradhu; Karththarin Valadhukaram Baraakkiramanseyyum.
17 naan Saavaamal, Pizhaiththirundhu, Karththarudaiya Seygaigalai Vivarippen.
18 karththar Ennai Veguvaai Thandiththum, Ennai Saavukku Oppukkodukkavillai.
19 needhiyin Vaasalgalaith Thiravungal; Naan Avaigalukkul Piravesiththu Karththarai Thudhippen.
20 karththarin Vaasal Idhuve; Needhimaangal Idharkul Piravesippaargal.
21 neer Enakku Sevikoduththu, Enakku Ratchippaayirundhapadiyaal, Naan Ummai Thudhippen.
22 veedukattugiravargal Aagaadhendru Thallina Kalle, Moolaikku Thalaikkallaayitru.
23 adhu Karththaraale Aayitru, Adhu Nammudaiya Kangalukku Aachchariyamaayirukkiradhu.
24 idhu Karththar Undupannina Naal, Idhile Kalikoorndhu Magizhakkadavom.
25 karththaave, Ratchiyum; Karththaave, Kaariyaththai Vaaikkappannum.
26 karththarudaiya Naamaththinaale Varugiravar Sthoththirikkappattavar; Karththarudaiya Aalayaththilirundhu Ungalai Aaseervadhikkirom.
27 karththar Nammai Piragaasippikkira Dhevanaayirukkiraar; Pandigaippaliyai Kondupoi Balipeedaththin Kombugalil Kayirugalaal Kattungal.
28  Neer En Dhevan, Naan Ummai Thudhippen; Neer En Dhevan, Naan Ummai Uyarththuven.
29 karththarai Thudhiyungal, Avar Nallavar; Avar Kirubai Endrumulladhu.
